steps.name: Close cookie consent
steps.selector: button >> text='Do not show this message again'

steps.name: Password
steps.selector: body > identity > div > div:nth-child(3) > login > div > div > div > harmony-credential > div.login-section_form_input > form > div > password-input > div > input

pages.comment: Jitterbit Harmony landing page, hover on App Builder to highlight tile
pages.title: landing

operations.comment: Snap with and without Jitterbit menu
operations.name: tile

pages.comment: App Builder home page (may or may not be empty)

steps.comment: If no apps. Times out if not found.

steps.name: Cancel new module
steps.selector: body > div.modal.setup-modal.modal-600.ng-scope.top.am-fade-and-slide-right > form > div.modal-header > div > div > ul > li:nth-child(1) > button

steps.name: Cancel new microflow
steps.selector: #MicroflowEditorController > div.modal-header > div > div > ul > li:nth-child(1) > button

steps.name: Cancel new ui-flow
steps.selector: #UIflowEditorController > div.modal-header > div > div > ul > li:nth-child(1) > button >> text='Cancel'

steps.Xselector: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.content-in2 > div > div.tab-content.branding.ng-scope > div > div > div > div.custom-domain.ng-scope.tab-pane.am-fade.active > div > div > div > div.host-block > span.bold.ng-binding

steps.name: blur via style
steps.content: #wrapper > div > div > div > div.row.clearfix.ng-scope > div.content-in2 > div > div.tab-content.branding.ng-scope > div > div > div > div.custom-domain.ng-scope.tab-pane.am-fade.active > div > div > div > div.host-block > span.bold.ng-binding { filter: blur(5px); }

steps.name: wait for email templates to load
wait for email templates to load
wait for new email template to open
